backend/main.mo: Defines a Book type, stores a single Honeydew book, and exposes a query to return the book list.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping product features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Human‑written summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining color variables and dark mode styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for landing and reader pages inside a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/BookCard.tsx: Book card UI displaying book details with a button that navigates to the reader page.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Shared layout providing header, footer, and content wrapper for all pages.
frontend/src/constants/books.ts: Empty placeholder file intended for book-related constants.
Exports the Honeydew chapter list with titles and starting pages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: React Query hook fetching books from the backend with limited retries and disabled auto‑refetch.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a warm educational color system and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Displays the landing page with a hero banner, book list fetched via useBooks, loading/error states, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ReaderPage.tsx: Renders a PDF reader with chapter navigation, search, loading/error handling, and iframe-based PDF display for a selected book.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, container settings, and includes typography and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, known issues, and feature requests related to improving PDF loading and direct-open capabilities.
